blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Admin Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad is designed to accelerate onboarding for Dynatrace administrators by consolidating essential configuration and management resources into a single, intuitive starting point. It provides guided access to documentation, best practices, and tutorial videos that help admins efficiently manage environments, user roles, alerting, integrations, and more. The goal is to reduce time-to-value, ensure consistent configuration standards, and empower admins to confidently maintain and evolve their Dynatrace deployment.

You can view the following documentation to learn how to [Manage your Dynatrace](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/manage-landing)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: Tagging and Alerting
content.description: Explore our Dynatrace University series on all things tagging and alerting

content.description: In this lesson, we'll learn how to bring clarity and control to our environment using tools built into Dynatrace.

content.title: Build your own Dynatrace Homepage
content.description: Use Launchpads to customise the landing page for users or groups to help navigating Dynatrace easier.

blocks.content:
### Documentation
--- 
 
Explore official Dynatrace documentation to access detailed guidance on environment setup, configuration management, user roles, alerting, integrations, and best practices for maintaining a secure and scalable observability platform.
* [Credential Vault](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/credential-vault)
  * A centralized repository where you securely store and manage credentials (username-password pairs, certificates or tokens) used by synthetic monitors, extensions and AppEngine apps.
* [Segments](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/segments)
  * Use segments to logically structure and conveniently filter observability data across apps on the Dynatrace platform.
* [Identity and Access Management](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/identity-access-management)
  * Control access to features and data in Dynatrace.
* [Account Management](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/account-management)
  * Manage your Dynatrace license, subscriptions, platform adoption, and environmental health.
* [Data Privacy and Security](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/section-data-privacy-and-security)
  * See how Dynatrace manages data security, protects data privacy, and maintains GDPR compliance.
* [Network Zones](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/network-zones)
  * Network zones can be leveraged to represent your network structure. They help you to route the traffic efficiently, avoiding unnecessary traffic across data centers and network regions.
* [Settings 2.0](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/settings20-landing)
  * Learn about the Settings 2.0 framework for Dynatrace configuration. 
* [System Notifications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/system-notifications)
  * Manage Dynatrace system notifications.
* [Tags and Metadata](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/tags-and-metadata-hub)
  * Understand how to use tags and metadata to organize your environment.

blocks.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
